p: Hs27 (human skin fibroblast) cell line was ordered and purchased from the American Type Culture Collection (ATCC). The cell line was cultured at Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI)-1640 culture media added with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) and 1% penicillin-streptomycin solution under an aseptic condition in 5% CO 2 humidified incubator. The Hs27 cell line was regularly checked for Mycoplasma contamination.
